Attaehed to this letter is Dallas Smythe^ study "Inventory No0 2 of
Educational Hadio Station Programming: Analysis of 19J>0 Programs with Comparisons,
19ii9~5Gn5 also a half dozen flyers that we had prepared to help sell the LA-TV
books. Five thousand of these will be distributed eventually to a variety of lists.
Too, some mimeographed material put out by the St. Louis Board of Education is
enclosed.
John Holt, who has charge of our mailing and duplicating set-up, has
called my attention to the Robert Lewis Shayon article in the February 2 issue of
the Saturday Review - by all means read it.
TRAVEL VOUCHERS—I believe that we have received travel vouchers from everyone ex¬
cept Allen Miller* Although Ausnms sent his along with a hurry sign on it, he then
forgot to sign it* Checks should be your way in about 10 days.
Jim Miles
P.S.: Just received word that the National Association for Better Radio and
Television (NAF3RAT) included in their first annual awards a special
citation to the National Association of Educational Broadcasters for
the New York and Los Angeles TV monitoring studies.
